pkgmetadata.longdescription: Efficient Bayesian Inference for Stochastic Volatility (SV) Models // Efficient algorithms for fully Bayesian estimation of stochastic volatility (SV) models via Markov chain Monte Carlo (MCMC) methods. Methodological details are given in Kastner and Frhwirth-Schnatter (2014) doi:10.1016/j.csda.2013.01.002; the most common use cases are described in Kastner (2016) doi:10.18637/jss.v069.i05. Also incorporates SV with leverage.
